About our wine bar & Shop
Fine Wines
We curate our wine shop's fine wine list based on the finest grapes of specific appellations, varietals and countries, all with respected ratings. Many are available by the glass in the wine bar.
WineEmotion
The wine bar features self serve wine tasting options from our WineEmotion Dispensing and Preservation System allowing us to offer samples of premium fine wines.

Welcome
There's much to see here. So, take your time, look around, and learn all there is to know about us. We hope you enjoy our site and take a moment to drop us a line.
Find out more
Private Events
Private Certified Sommelier Led Events
Chris McDonald Noel, Certified Specialist of Wine
Private In Shop Tastings with Food Pairing
$49/pp
Plan a tasting off schedule night with your own group of 6-8 guests at WineDown. 4 wines and wine specific food pairing.
WineDine Cruises
$89/pp
Plan an exclusive tasting cruise off schedule night with your own group of 6-10 guests. 4 wines and wine specific food pairing.
Your Location Private Wine Tastings
$250 + $20/pp
Plan an event at your location, wine only. 4 to 10 guests.
Special pricing for 11+guests. Wine can be paired to your menu.
Industry Wine Tasting & Training
$300
Restaurants or venues seeking staff training with your inventory.
Menu analysis included.
Want us to supply the wine? $300 + wine 15% over cost.*
*In most cases, based on your menu we can make recommendations and provide good representations of certain varietals or blends for tasting. We are not a distributor and do not offer any wines for resale. We cannot guarantee the available of the wines provided.
